title: Radiance
body: Radiance is a chat platform that aims to recreate the experience of Discord. Radiance has a sleek and modern design that is both visually appealing and user-friendly, making it easy for users to navigate and communicate with others.

title: Ziimgur
body: Ziimgur is an image hosting site that allows users to upload, share, and store images and photos. The platform is designed to be user-friendly, with a clean and intuitive interface that makes it easy to navigate and use.

title: GHTasks
body: GHTasks is a task management platform that leverages the power of Github repositories to help users organize and manage their tasks. The platform is designed to be simple and intuitive, with a clean and modern interface that makes it easy to create, assign, and track tasks.

title: CUID-Generator
body: CUID-generator is a web application that generates unique, cryptographically-secure identifiers (CUIDs) that can be used as unique keys or IDs in a variety of applications. What sets CUID-generator apart is its modern and user-friendly interface, which makes it easy and intuitive to use.
